title: Issue regarding MSI GE62 2QD Apache Pro
body: Greetings, recently my MSi laptop has been freezing right at the beginning of the game similar to what is happening in the video I linked of a DOTA 2 player who has the same laptop and issue. Because of this, I have lost 45 LP and receive 4 leavers in my history which resulted in a lower priority queue. I'm not a tech-savvy person and because of this, I don't know what is wrong. I've tried using google and people have said to uninstall the windows update because the windows update might be the issue, but it isn't for me because my laptop/client still freezes completely at the start of the game. I'm desperately looking for step-by-step help to get this resolved.

replies.body: Hey! I just saw this. I have the same rig. I also had the same problem. Go to league, and right click select Troubleshoot Compatability. It will do some calculating and then operate under a windows 7 thing.SUCCESS!

That's such a nice rig!  I love MSI laptops!  The issue you're having may actually be due to a recent issue with a Windows 10 update.  Some players have had this freezing issue, and the culprit appears to be the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disabling that should get you fixed up.  Hope that helps, but let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JF2NIzdi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-26T22:42:16.844+0000)
>
> That's such a nice rig!  I love MSI laptops!  The issue you're having may actually be due to a recent issue with a Windows 10 update.  Some players have had this freezing issue, and the culprit appears to be the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disabling that should get you fixed up.  Hope that helps, but let me know!

I was successfully able to start the custom match without freezing up. However, I'm still a bit worried to queue up for a normal/ranked game because I already accrued 4 leavers in the past couple days and currently on a 5 game low priority queue.

> [{quoted}](name=hypermonkieboi,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JF2NIzdi,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-26T22:56:05.190+0000)
>
> I was successfully able to start the custom match without freezing up. However, I'm still a bit worried to queue up for a normal/ranked game because I already accrued 4 leavers in the past couple days and currently on a 5 game low priority queue.

Update: Successfully was able to play an ARAM and now queueing for normal draft. Pretty frustrated about the low priority queue, but I only have 4 more left. Porocles, you are officially my favorite Rioter. I didn't have to go through all the nonsense I found from other sources that said to "update BIOS and update drivers" (no clue what it means since I'm not tech savvy)

Thanks for tip. Yes, I do believe it has to do with the windows update because I never had this issue prior to it. I've already uninstalled the update and the issue persisted and I just disabled the xbox app and I'm currently testing my game in a custom.
